# PagedPickerSubscriptionStoreControlStyle.Placement

**Structure**

The placement of paged subscription picker in a subscription store view.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Placement
```

## Getting a placement

- **automatic**
- **bottomBar**: A placement that locates the paged picker in a bar near the bottom of the main scroll view in a subscription store view.
- **buttonsInBottomBar**: A hybrid placement that positions subscription controls within the main scroll view, and places auxiliary buttons in the bottom bar.
- **scrollView**

## Conforms To

- RawRepresentable
- SubscriptionStoreControlPlacement

items.description: A placement that locates the paged picker in a bar near the bottom of the main scroll view in a subscription store view.
items.name: bottomBar

items.description: A hybrid placement that positions subscription controls within the main scroll view, and places auxiliary buttons in the bottom bar.
items.name: buttonsInBottomBar

title: PagedPickerSubscriptionStoreControlStyle.Placement
